titleStmt.title: A reply to the Answer of the Amicable accommodation being a fourth vindication of the Papist misrepresented and represented : in which are more particularly laid open some of the principal methods by which the papists are misrepresented by Protestants in their books and sermons.
titleStmt.author: Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Gother. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
